thread.title: Mastodon Members Announce Side Project Called Turd Factory: 'It's The Weirdest Thing I Was Ever Part Of' [News]
thread.title_full: Mastodon Members Announce Side Project Called Turd Factory: 'It's The Weirdest Thing I Was Ever Part Of' [News]

title: Mastodon Members Announce Side Project Called Turd Factory: 'It's The Weirdest Thing I Was Ever Part Of' [News]
text: UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 3 hours ago 3 Today in greatest news ever, Troy and Brent from Mastodon are planning to resurrect a project they had earlier in 2016 called Turd Factory.Sanders told Loudwire : "This is the weirdest thing I've ever heard. Brent Hinds and myself, we had a brief band that I'm really trying to bring back and it's the weirdest thing I was ever a part of and it was very, very enjoyable - Turd Factory."It was short-lived and a lot of fun. We're gonna have a new release coming out, I'm gonna go ahead and say it. It's gonna come out at the end of 2017."Feel free to share just how super excited you are in the comments.
